data.name: i Have Powers!
data.detailed_description:
SuperHeroes the choice is yours in I Have Powers! Use your power to beat evil!

I Have Powers! Is a make your own character SuperHero Arcade Game, where you design your custom Hero and enter a town brimming with crime and

terror.

From shooting Lightning Bolts from your hands to shooting FIRE, like a human flame thrower. You can do almost anything.

Remember those Plastic Superheroes you used to buy in the toy store? Pretending to make them fight each other? Well, you can do that in this game, make your character, fight bad guys and level up your character into an unstoppable conqueror.

Use your secret identity to survey a situation before revealing your costume and powers!

Lots of different powers to try out and make 100's of unique characters! Do you want to wield weapons like Commando, or Fly around like Superman, it's your character and you can make as many as you want, beware though because this is a roguelike game where your character gets deleted if they get defeated.

How long can your character exist? How powerful can they become?

data.short_description: SuperHeroic SuperHero Arcade Fighting Game, make a Superhero using the classic 4 color costume design of comic-book Heroes. See how powerful you can make your character, see how long they can survive. Choose lots of different SuperPowers, stop crime by any means!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: intel or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VGA or better
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VGA or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: i Have Powers! Copyright ©2020 John C. Ragland

content_descriptors.notes: i Have Powers! A Create your own character arcade shooting game, where you use your character to combat varying levels of crime and mayhem. Enemies are depicted being defeated in various methods from being destroyed by characters superpowers or conventional weaponry in graphic fashion, players can also use the environment as a weapon by utilizing armed vehicles and various environmental property.
